text: guys isn't possible to get the results variable in templates?

i'm experiencing a difference between domains. The same search url works for blog domains and doesn't work for lp domains.
Moreover, I have a website of another client in which we are able to retrieve the "results" variable in the search template. The same search template in any other portal doesn't work.
sounds like you might have the domain set in the query or you're testing on preview urls (which don't work without defining the domain)
It’s been a long time since this was possible. To keep pages snappy, they’re loaded directly from the client.
